website_summaries.verdict: An affordable 2.1 channel, 350-watt system that offers just the essentials, such as HDMI in and out and Bluetooth connectivity.
pros: Although there aren't many bells and whistles with this product, it does offer voice-enhancement technology to help make the dialogue easier to understand
Additionally, the S-Force PRO Front Surround technology helps to deliver a more immersive listening experience
cons: The subwoofer may not feature the chest-pounding resonance some viewers were hoping to experience

customer_reviews.title: Downsized from a surround system
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar has really good sound and is super simple to set up and use. I downsized from a 7.1 surround setup (it didn't make sense for the space) but I don't feel we lost any sound, if anything the dialogue is enhanced. I bought this soundbar when it was on sale, but would have been happy if I had paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bort

customer_reviews.title: Sent back as defective (bass response was really bad)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews and it being a little higher power than other similarly priced units. Unfortunately I was very disappointing. Maybe I expected too much but this was no better than a $140 Samsung bar I bought 5 years ago. Everything connected and worked properly, just very weak base. I also thought the actually sound bar sounded a little off. Maybe it would have gotten better if I allowed it to break in. I played various TV shows and music for about 30 minutes and was certain this was NOT what I wanted. No issue with Amazon return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I have had a big screen LG for a few years now. The picture is great but the sound is not. I have always been a Sony fan and after reading the reviews for this soundbar I bought it. What a great choice!!! The sound is perfect, the remote and directions are easy to navigate. I may be purchasing one for another TV in the house.
customer_reviews.author: CL Corlis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a house!!
customer_reviews.text: It is great for a family room for surround sound and for your music! I would purchase again!! The sub-roofer also connects to my other Sony products automatically. It works well with my cell as well so I can listen to my music directly from phone....my favorite music!!
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Mocha

customer_reviews.title: NO NO STOP LOOK SOME ELSE
customer_reviews.text: It suck the speaker quit working a few days ago and now I can't return it do not buy whatever you do do not buy sorry sorry I'm some piece of crap and I just bought this on July 25th
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar, beware ink on shipping box
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar -- came in very easy to access packaging. Was easy to set up. Be sure to use an HDMI ARC connection from your television if you are able -- it makes things much easier, because then the TV can control the volume of the soundbar. Pairing between the wireless subwoofer and the soundbar was very easy. Do be careful where you place the package after receiving it from UPS. The Sony packaging will have ink on the bottom of it that will easily transfer to other surfaces. I stupidly placed the box on the bedspread in the guest bedroom, and ink transferred to the bedspread. Took significant effort to recover the bedspread from that.
customer_reviews.author: jillstovall

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality = bad
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not good at all. Stay away! I was originally excited for this Soundbar because of the ARC feature and Sony brand, but oh boy I was so disappointed. My old $80 Soundbar from a no-name brand sounds much better. The midrange sounds are so sharp that it makes any TV show very painful to listen to and the overall sound is very tinny. I returned this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Will Matos III

customer_reviews.title: A Worthwhile Addition to a Great TV
customer_reviews.text: While the full-screen sound generator of my new 55" Sony 4K OLED set is decent-sounding, I decided to try this soundbar. Installation was dead easy and the upgrade was truly worthwhile. The resulting sound is fuller and broader than that provided by the TV itself, with more volume, deeper more satisfying bass and clearer speech. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Toptension

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and it's dead.  Sound was never good.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Don't waste your money. Purchased in December 2019 and it stopped working April 2020. 4 months and they won't do anything for me. I'm just out the money . And honestly the sound was terrible even before it stopped working . You can't hear dialog at all, just loud music and base.. you cannot hear anyone talking unless you have it turned up to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: Stated doing a little research on sound bars about a week ago with everybody in being quarantined me n my family have been watching a lot of movies but anyway I'm a big fan of bose so my first thought was bose for 180 then I found out it has no power button on the speaker itself n the remote is the size of a grown man's arm so i passed also looked into jbl it was 130 but reviews said it was all bass I'm really glad I went with this it sounds good the price was great and shipping was incredible
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Does the sub work?
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it sounds better than the flat screen speakers? It comes with a huge sub but we couldn’t really feel it even with hip-hop music. Definitely sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better out there than this
customer_reviews.text: Over two hundred dollars and they don't include wall mounts. Ridiculous. They just provide two holes in the back and you need to find your own screws. Not even machined screw holes no they are plastic holes. So I spent more time grinding down toggler bolts I used than it took to position the template on the wall. I would not buy it again just because they failed to include wall mounts. The speaker is barely better than the TV speakers but the wireless subwoofer makes it a little better. Music does sound good via Bluetooth. You can definitely find something better. I almost sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about the sound quality! Sounds great! However, was not thrilled with the lack of a LCD/LED display like all my other soundbars! Having a LCD/LED display makes it so much easier to know what mode you are in!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Full sounding TV
customer_reviews.text: I like that on the remote are buttons for 7 different sound settings. I use cinema, sports, music, and news. It will get loud and still sound pure. Not loud enough to shred the speakers but more than any adult could want. My only complaint is it is supposed to switch itself off and on with the TV. Mine only switches off and i have to restart it every time. there is a setting to change but it is NOT in the instruction manual. It was in the setup sheet that got tossed after I set it up. I could probably find the instruction online but most of the time I just use the TV sound so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Blown away...amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...just WOW! We have a sound bar in our living room and it’s good. We were looking to upgrade the sound in our bedroom after adding a new seating area. I decided not to go with a similar item that I purchased for the living room and upgrade to this set. My husband hooked it up for the first time tonight and turned on a movie. We were blown away!! Now he wants to upgrade our soundbar to another of these for the living room! We will definitely be purchasing another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherInTx

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just received the sound bar yesterday and, so far, am more than pleased with the sound. The combined 320 watt power output fills our living room quite nicely; indeed the subwoofer provides booming base that really adds to certain movies coming close to bring the theater experience home. As a test, we watched Bohemian Rhapsody and Queen's classic music was rich, clear, and engaging. Until yesterday, I had a cheap TaoTronics bar. There is simply no comparison. For only $200, you couldn't really ask for a better speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Sony Fan
customer_reviews.text: Sony devices will easily synch with this sound bar and the company stands behind their warranty. Volume level can vary and dialogue can be difficult to hear even at the highest settings for some shows. This will provide a nice improvement over the default TV speakers. SETUP - pair with TV bluetooth, pair bass with soundbar, choose cinema/dialogue/music default settings
customer_reviews.author: Deltapez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this soundbar/subwoofer. Easy set up and instructions. Once I plugged in the HDMI from soundbar to TV HDMI/ARC it paired immediately with the subwoofer. I am not an audiophile but I know good sound. For the money I highly recommend it. Yes, there are high end soundbars out there, but I just wanted to have better sound than what I was hearing on my Samsung smart tv. I am much pleased after several weeks. And the thing I like most is that the remote features a separate volume control for the subwoofer. It has several settings on the remote for sound.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carlton

customer_reviews.title: A very good sound bar for a good price. And its a Sony.
customer_reviews.text: My old Sony sound bar was good, but this one is better. Larger speakers in the bar put out the fuller sound I needed for my large room. The wireless Bluetooth woofer simplifies install and works perfectly. With my older unit I controlled volume with the dedicated remote. To turn the unit on I pushed the power button on the woofer. With this new unit it turns on when I turn the TV on, and off when I turn TV off, both with the TV remote. The volume control on the TV remote also controls the sound bar volume.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For what it is I am really impressed with this sound bar and subwoofer. Sure it is not top notch superior sound system that sounds like movie theater but definitely a night and day deference between my nicer 65" Samsung TV. The sound bar gives you nice sound through out the whole volume range and the bass hits really good especially during action movies. Setup is a breeze basically every thing needed is right in the box. My smart TV picked it right up and I was listening to some much better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound bar upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Just received this sound bar as an upgrade to a smaller Visio sound bar. It is in a fairly large great room with a vaulted ceiling. This sound bar completely fills the room and beyond with fantastic sound and the subwoofer is extraordinary also. Excellent power with very very little distortion. BB King never sounded this good. The Visio sound bar is now in my wood working shop and is a great upgrade to the pitiful amazon echo. Great deal at $198 and free shipping. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Our TV has always been lacking in the audio department. After adding this soundbar to it, it's amazing how clear and dynamic everything sounds now! Definitely happy with this soundbar. Only thing that I would say could probably use some improvement is the volume control. Some steps in volume leave you wishing there was one more step in between.
customer_reviews.author: Josh @ The Internet

customer_reviews.title: Wireless sub messes with ps4 wifi connection
customer_reviews.text: Its got great sound and the quality is good. How ever if u have it near a ps4 it will interfere with the wifi for the system. I thought it was my router going bad, replaced it then i thought it was my system, took it to a friend's house and it worked fine. I finally decided to turn the sub off and bam, ps4 wifi worked like it used to. I guess i just can't use it with my ps4 but in reality i use headphones for most gaming. Overall it would be a good for a small cinema room or a living room for sports.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Aleo

customer_reviews.title: Not too pleased with the sound
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the sound too much. Kinda weak....Sometimes it sounds scratchy when you turn the volume up. Gna shop for a better one with a much better sound. Would recommend for a very small tv...Not a 55" or bigger though
customer_reviews.author: Myss Chocolitt

customer_reviews.title: Even Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a budget sound bar after our old one broke, and this one turned out to be even better than expected! It actually turns on when the TV is turned on (our old one had to be separately told to turn on) and the sound quality is pretty great. It seems to keep the volume more consistent than our old one too - for example, there are sometime certain commercials that seem extra loud, but this soundbar keep a consistent volume so there isn't one specific commercial or sound that is suddenly loud (or too quiet). We have it hooked up to our tv with cords, but it does have bluetooth capability. Looks nice too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Corn

customer_reviews.title: It works sort of...
customer_reviews.text: It works but I had to turn it up practically all the way just to hear it properly :( Hooked up to 55 inch TCL ROKU TV. Read somewhere there is an issue with this product and TCL TVs. Not sure if this was my problem or if product is just crappy. I used to be able to trust in Sony but last few Sony products I purchased have been garbage. Don't pay more for lack of quantity. I disconnected it after a few months and just reconnected my home theater system, at least I can hear speech properly again.
customer_reviews.author: bear989us

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar has been perfect. All I wanted it for is to listen to podcasts and pandora, and it's been great for both of those. It was easy to set up the Blue tooth connection on phone and ipad. Has good bass too. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jack in Oswego

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Two Times
customer_reviews.text: First time...sound bar was dead on arrival, would not power up. Second time...remote was missing. C'mon Sony...you're better than this. Aren't you?
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small open layout , and works great. Subwoofer gets a nice deep bass, which I keep at a bare min or off most of the time. We have a Tenent below us, and mostly watch news and non-action stuff in this room. We can hear the spoken words clearly now, and a good sound overall. I tried outer sound bars, and either I didn’t care for the overall voice sound, or were too expensive to justify paying for.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.M

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but the user interface is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Most sound bars I have used allow you to train another remote to operate the sound bar, to eliminate yet another remote. This one will not allow that. Also there is no intuitive feedback for volume, device connection etc. They expect you to keep the "decoder" from the user manual handy. I also found that unlike most other models this one will not shut down if there is not input for a period of time. This unit you must explicitly power off. I like it when I turn off the TV or stop the bluetooth feed that after 60 minutes it would turn off. Nope it will stay on forever.
customer_reviews.author: John Vossler

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my new TV at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on getting a sound bar for awhile now and boy does it make all the difference! My tv’s speakers are behind the screen often making it difficult to here the sound well. This sound bar and subwoofer bring sound to life!!! Setup was easy and everything needed was included. The Bluetooth subwoofer synced itself! The remote adds yet another remote to the pill and gives me another reason to find a true universal remote. Haha The sound bar works fantastic with all my accessories too like PS4, Blu-ray players, cable box, Apple TV and streaming services.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Works with the TV very well
customer_reviews.text: This one supports ARC which means it can be controlled from the TV remote. Our TV has ROKU built in and these speakers work great with it. We didn't want to go too cheap on the speakers and didn't want to go crazy either. These speakers are a good middle ground that work for TV awesome and you basically forget they are there. The TV has great sound and I never have to worry about them. They just do there job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bang for the buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audio snob. I had an old Vizio soundbar with a wireless subwoofer. I feel like I’m at the theater with this soundbar. Sound clarity is an amazing step up from where we were. Our room size is smaller, so I don’t know how a large room might effect the quality. From our perspective, this is an amazing deal from a highly reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Ayntscurd

customer_reviews.title: I’ve heard cheaper sound bars that sound better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard cheaper sound bars that sound better. I bought this primarily because I have two Sony TVs, and I wanted something small for the bedroom. I had a JBL for speaker remote satellite subwoofer, set up before, it did cost more money, but had way more features +3 HDMI inputs. I do not recommend the sound bar not for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pera

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK WITH SCEPTRE TV
customer_reviews.text: We have a sceptre tv and since Sony and sceptre use some of the same coding, when we would use the remote for the soundbar, it would do something to the tv (ie: turning the volume up on the sound bar might turn the source on the TV.) it was a nightmare bc every button did something it wasn’t Supposed to do towards the TV, just because they use some of the same coding. There is no way we could’ve known this so it was a hassle to set everything up and then find that out and have to take it all down. We returned it ultimately
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, some subwoofer connection issues
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound from this product, but the subwoofer does not connect via Bluetooth unless you completely unplug it and plug it back in while the sound bar is on. This might be due to the sound bar being turned off completely while not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, very disappointing. Sounds muffled - there are barely any highs regardless of the setting it’s on. The subwoofer seems very quiet as well, but is not a major issue for me personally. I have $30 computer speakers that sound better than these and I really wish I was joking. I was really looking forward to getting a sound bar for my new TV, and this is not it. The fact that I got these as a “deal” for $150 rather than almost $300 off really makes me sympathize for people who paid full price for this nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: a reasonable price for an ok product
customer_reviews.text: in my view, this is a very basic improvement over the built-in tv speakers. while noticeable, the sub's output is marginal at best. what you will have is full sound, sans surround. if that is the goal, then these will suffice. the wireless connection to the sub works well, along with hdmi/cec connectivity. frankly, we have an older model sony bar that has a bit more punch. it was about the same $$ but had more inputs to behave more like a home theater. still, it ain't 5.1 but any means!
customer_reviews.author: g - raleigh burbs

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, high quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: We hooked this up to our Vizio tv because we were tired of the sound radiating from the back of the tv, through the wall and not out into the living room. One thing to remember is to turn off the actual tv speaker or you’ll get an echo... after a few minutes of “duh”... it was AMAZING. The subwoofer and sound bar have separate volume controls so you can turn the subwoofer down or off completely. For those family movie nights and intense action movies it’s crazy how loud the subwoofer really is... it can vibrate your chest with the right movie. A+ for Sony once again. Worth EVERY penny! (Don’t forget your HDMI cable ;))
customer_reviews.author: Shelley412

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup & learning
customer_reviews.text: Using with TV in our great room. Replaces nicely with added sound quality what we had from the TV speakers. Nice remote, but the mute button should be larger. I like the presets for cinema, voice, music, etc. -- saves fiddling with bass & treble levels -- just touch one button. Ny TV is nine years old & I cannot get the TV remote to turn on the soundbar; however, I only have to turn on soundbar with its remote & use it for level control. Have only had this for a month; I expect to give it a 5 rating if performance holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality really subpar
customer_reviews.text: disasterous sound especially when turned up 1. trebles resolution is near absent: can't make out violin from trumpet. 2. sounds like AM signal from an old radio 3. subwoofer way toooo weak: you can't hear it (let lone feel the vibration) even at maximum subwoofer volume. really disappointing sound quality. only slightly better than my very small bose color soundlink. way below my edifier s350 Although it's equally bulky. Sony usually makes great stuff, but not this time.
customer_reviews.author: maccab

customer_reviews.title: The best sound bar I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other soundbars on the market the price is not excessive and I'm very satisfied with it's performance. The Bluetooth connection to the bass speaker (3' away) always works, and the sound is great. The sound modes (concert, news, etc.) are too artificial so I leave it on movies.
customer_reviews.author: John Weersing

customer_reviews.title: Sony continues to produce great audio products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the basement. The sound bar is sleek and was easily mounted. The wireless subwoofer is much larger than anticipated but produces a lot of extra sound. The wireless aspect is superb. Together, the sound easily fills a large basement. The remote has a series of programmed sound modes, such as cinema, sports, music, etc., which we will use. Ultimately, after a lot of research, I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mo

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressive
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not so impressive. The sub/base is weak and the sound bar quality is like a paper cup. I am a little disappointed, as I was expecting something a little more solid from Sony. I would save up for something that has better quality....not much of a upgrade from your TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: If you need a Soundbar for your Sony TV and Blu-ray Players, this is the one to get !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. The only thing in manual , they did not advise about pairing to Blu-ray player and TV. All 3 are Sony. Just to tell you , when you watch your 4K ,Blu-ray , or DVD you have to hit Bluetooth on your Blu-ray players remote or you won’t hear anything. Same when you go back to TV. You’ll hit TV on soundbar remote, then Bluetooth. The sound is amazing. You’ll feel as if you’re at the Movie Theater. Affordable and easy to use. Great seller
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Maria Radwanski

customer_reviews.title: For 1st Time Soundbar Buyers
customer_reviews.text: Always love sony products! This particular sound is a quality buy, for a 1st time buyer. The Subwoofer is not the best, and the bar itself is definitely better then TV speakers. Sleek design, looks nice & crafted well.. But for the price you can definitely find better sound quality else where..
customer_reviews.author: La Mont

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Tweeters Flattens The Quality
customer_reviews.text: The two mid-range drivers just can't deliver the crisp highs this system cries out for. The addition of tweeters would have been significant and it's a major oversight. Mid-range and lows are excellent, but it all ends up sounding flat. Upping the volume does bring out more of the high frequencies, but it needs to get pretty loud, which the system can easily do. The subwoofer delivers punches and great rumbling, but there are no crisp face slaps or glass shattering highs.
customer_reviews.author: Quintus

customer_reviews.title: Keep researching. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Remember what those cheap speakers sounded like that came included with your Compaq computer in 2008? This is same level of audio. All mids and muddy/swarmy bass. I wasn’t expecting huge results but this is embarrassingly bad audio quality. I found myself trying really hard to like it but it makes noise, not music. Unless you’re solely going to use it to punch up voices, this is a hard pass. Packing it up now to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, enough bass at the right moments, and not so much bass to where u cant understand people when they talk. In other words great mix of high, lows, and mids. Only downfall is there is no volume led display so you don’t know how loud it is until the tv comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a sound bar for my bedroom. I have a full sound system in my living room, but I wanted to be able to enjoy my music in my room too. I tried a variety of other Bluetooth options, and happened to come across this one. I am very very impressed with how great this sounds! Bass is perfect. Plugged the sound bar in, plugged the sub in on the other side of my room, and it was up and running. Worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good dynamic range for classical music
customer_reviews.text: Volume control for the bar and the sub woofer is not visually easy. I'd like to see what is the volume level, particularity when you are changing the sound source. Like if I switch from TV to Blue-Ray, or Chrome Cast, you maybe startled.
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This has the all important HDMI ARC (audio return channel) if you want to control it with your TV's remote. The included remote and the "blinking" lEDs on the front panel are confusing, but in practise not used if you use HDMI ARC. I'm old and going deaf, so it sounds good enough. I like the wireless bass box thing. That's a nice feature used to be only on fancier ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tailor Made

customer_reviews.title: Work great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound it just as I expected. It's not like total surround sound but still sounds great. That is the only reason I gave the sound 4 stars instead of 5. It's way better than just TV speaking sound. It takes some configuration to allow this sound system to work with your cable or TV remote controls for volume control but once I researched the proper procedure it was easy. Overall a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: johnnified

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wireless setup, sound is good, easy to hook up, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know what to say. This will do fine for now, but had I known what I was really getting when I bought this i wouldn't have bought it. The subwoofer is huge but the bass is almost non existent. I have watched movies with shootouts, listened to bass heavy music, and it just doesn't put out the bass I expected. I would say this is just a small step up from my televisions audio.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco & Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this sound bar with subwoofer,it's beautiful awesome sound,powerful bass..different sound setting from music to talk shows and movies all different bass settings.I turn it up loud that shakes post is on the wall I haven't max out how loud it get but it pretty bad azz
customer_reviews.author: cyril

customer_reviews.title: It's ok sony
customer_reviews.text: Volume with my sony TV is up around 70 on most channels? And a horable lag in video and audio sinking up hard to watch news mouths move and then the sound comes out later kinda drives me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt have asked for Better. Great Bass and overall sound. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The bass on the woofer is pretty solid. Not too high and not too low. Connection to my Sony Bravia 950G was seamless. Bluetooth worked great as well. Couldnt have asked for Better. Great sound overall. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: Will not link up with DirecTV remotes trying to get information on this is nearly impossible
customer_reviews.text: Won't link up with any remotes including my brand new Sony Bravia TV. My Vizio and Polk Audio Soundbar linked up with my DirecTV remote with no problem. But the Sony HT S350 will only power on and off. not sure what happened...returned. tech support no help. I don't like the idea of having a separate remote just for sound. all audio settings are preset so you cannot adjust anything. the sound quality is meh-...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution without rear speakers
customer_reviews.text: works great without the hassle of having rear surround speakers. Works good for my application of a small room where I wanted to have better speakers than what came in the thin TV. Great bass can really feel it.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, beautiful looking unit
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar with subwoofer. Wow, fantastic. What a huge difference from the tv speakers. Plus wireless and Bluetooth connection. I listen to Spotify over the unit and it's concert quality
customer_reviews.author: paul barrett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound nice bass. Remote seems to only work from a short distance but it could also be the angle I have the bar at that is not getting a good signal from the remote. Other then that its a great sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: KEEP IT REAL ✌

customer_reviews.title: Bass could be louder
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the bass would be better if it were louder. Overall, however, this greatly enhanced the sound from our 65" HiSense. No lag, responds to my tv or FIOS remote. Everyone likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: When people get what they order they become continued customers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband. For our 14th anniversary. And the remote did not come with it. We're disappointed. In the buy of the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: myra penn

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for 4 months, but not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Intermittently cuts out at random and plays no sound at all. Everything is connected properly, the system often needs to be reset in order resume normal function. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money, sound so-so
customer_reviews.text: good looking sound bar and worth the money, however if you can afford it get a Bose system. The sound in my opinion is so-so but for the money its OK. Nice lookin and easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Usually not a fan of Sony home theater systems in all honesty but they really got this one right and I would buy it even at a higher costs. The lows and highs are clear and the bass of the subwoofer are wonderful. I can hear dialogue in all scenes from whisper quiet to loud. This successfully turned my room into a theater.
customer_reviews.author: Dartell Dior

customer_reviews.title: Great but sub
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from sound bar but sub woofer sounds too low. Maybe it's just me but I prefer it to sound louder than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lglizete

customer_reviews.title: Ok but HDMI ARC needed help
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was poor to just ok. Had to really turn it up to hear people talk. Then music or sound bites (commercials) were very loud. Also HDMI ARC would not turn the speaker on when tv was turned on. You would have to use the separate sound bar remote. This was with a new TLC 65” tv.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. I've tried multiple different shows, movies, music etc for sound difference and quality. And I'm astounded. It sounds amazing. Puts out clear powerful audio. The subwoofer is strong and deep. Bluetooth works great and music projects perfect. So far I have nothing negative to say. Definitely worth the money. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: A big bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super system with really nice sound quality that will surprise even discerning listeners! The subwoofer is super! I wanted a system that did not take up space, gave me theater like sound on a moderate budget. For the money spent, I as m 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: James E. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Sound clarity and quality blows me away
customer_reviews.text: This is one badass sound system! Definitely worth the money. Figured since I have to be quarantined at home might as well make it as enjoyable as possible and this system sure does exactly that. The sound quality is top notch, i can clearly hear every little sound thats been recorded with such ease its truly remarkable. I've come to find i have just one problem with purchasing this unit, my roommate in the room next to mine hates my guts now because of the volume coming through the walls. If you're thinking about buying this,do yourself a favor and buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what it is. You can pay lots of money for more options. But, this is just a good upgrade to your TV speakers if you need a little more oomph. Not really the best answer for a giant home-theater set-up. All I wanted was some better speakers when I'm watching a Sci-Fi movie or concert DVD. I'm happy with my choice. Easy to set up and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Doogie

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Sound!! Simple setup.
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular sound and easy setup! I’m no techie just a simple gal looking for better sound than the tv speakers put out. This system all I hoped for and then some! The Bluetooth feature is great since we enjoy listening to music as much as we like watching TV. and the price!!! Wow!! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: shannon allison

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent soundbar, not because I needed one but to enhance my tv watching experience in my bedroom and I picked this one based off the reviews and I am not disappointed. Setup was super easy but if you're not careful you could throw away the box with the remote still inside since the remote placement isn't obvious. The sound is great and I'm also able.to connect my bluetooth devices for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Not quite 5 stars. I do like it tho. The sound is clear and the sub hits pretty well. It is a pretty good value for the price. I would recommend this to other people. One note is that it doesn’t have a medium really. You have to turn it up pretty loud to hear the sub speaker. That’s about the other problem which really isn’t a problem for me since I prefer it loud anyway. My wife on the other hand doesn’t like it when it’s that loud.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kamenski

customer_reviews.title: Good soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally pleased with the Soundbar, but find it frustrating that sometimes it doesn't function unless I power on the blue ray player. I don't understand this. Also, there could be clearer documentation of the meaning of the indicator lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jim59

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 months then stopped while we were watching a movie. We did all the resets and things. Then all the sudden it works. Then it stops working out of nowhere all over again. I bought Sony because we have a Sony tv. I'm not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi Beers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! The installation could not have been easier!! I hooked it up to a Sony Bravia TV and the two items synced flawlessly. Great value, unbelievable sound!! It made dialogue MUCH easier to hear. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: gnpi

customer_reviews.title: Home Theater!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a mid priced system with blue tooth bass, this should be your go-to. The stereo separation gives the illusion that you've got a 5.1 system, and being able to put the bass anywhere there's an outlet is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Dion

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Bar. Bass seems a bit underwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good Soundbar and definitely an improvement to the TVs sound. I like the sound bar for movies and it was easy to set up. Volume for the music on Bluetooth is a bit underwhelming, particularly for Bass. Our living area is not big, about 300 sq feet, so it’s surprising the bass seems Low even at max bass volume for the rated wattage of this system. That’s why I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PC of CA

customer_reviews.title: for the price is really good....
customer_reviews.text: is pretty amazing for the price.. not as loud as I expected it but pretty good quality sounds, and materials.....for gaming its perfect....you could blast it all up without bothering your neighbors, and getting a good quality sound at the same time..
customer_reviews.author: arling a tejada e

customer_reviews.title: Sony sound bar & subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a lil while ago, very pleased thus far, sound quality is solid & very nice, I read the reviews so letting the subwoofer break in on lower volume levels in the begining Is key, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: It is a low end sound bar system.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a more powerful sub woofer. You have to turn the volume quite high, just to hear it. I replaced an existing sound bar system with this one. Should have saved my money...
customer_reviews.author: Paul chenier

customer_reviews.title: A SONY OF MY OWNY
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONE to get. The sound is incredible. From Bass to Treble you will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! I don’t understand some of the reviews I read prior to purchasing this sound bar, especially people complaining about the bass. This thing will literally rattle my double paned windows while also reproducing excellent clarity. True, it’s not a 6 - 10 speaker surround system but for the price and performance it’s very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sounding bar. It's trivial to set it up using the ARC connection. It took me longer to get it out of the box than it did for me to setup and connect it. Works perfectly with my Sony TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: Need more time.
customer_reviews.text: Have it a four because I haven’t had it long enough to determine if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Day

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and simple set-up
customer_reviews.text: Easily connects to TV and immediately starts working. Much better sound than the TV speakers!! The wireless subwoofer is great because you can place it anywhere and it connects with Bluetooth automatically.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Despite plugging in directly to the tv the sound bar was intermittently not giving off sound. I have a decent sized living room and this sound bar was overall inefficient. Long story short the sound bar is not even 6 months old in our house and no longer in use. Would recommend spending money elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: B-rad

customer_reviews.title: A great sound bar for a large bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for my 35’ x 20‘ bedroom. It really makes the movies, live. One of the favorite things I like to do is listen to music streaming from my iPhone and watching a movie at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth williams

customer_reviews.title: Audio could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but trying g to listen to voices in a movie is sometimes difficult. I can't find a good setting for audio clarity
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Does not help with hard to hear dialogue... still struggling to hear the actual talking parts of movies. All the functions on remote really don't do much at all, just for show. The sub woofer is excellent though.
customer_reviews.author: Big AL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Performance
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the sound quality of these two relatively small speakers. Wow! The bass is thunderous, and the sound bar is clear and vivid at all volumes. I am very pleased with these speakers, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Road Runner

customer_reviews.title: Really good 👍
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly nice sounds quality and pretty good bass. I bought this as a present for my boyfriend and im pleasantly suprised it sounds good. I have a 5.1 micca setup but he likes simple and clean. I'm glad I chose this one for him.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: No sound came out of speaker even though it stated on tv it was transferring sound to speakers. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Less than average sound but an essential part of our TV
customer_reviews.text: The Easiest setup. Great for sound larger than a potato.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: Goes beautifully with my Sony Bravia 65" TV. The sound is excellent. I like the voice system for sports programs. Watching movies is just like being in a theater without having to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: The product is straight forward. Good value and good sound especially considering the price. Once you learn the lights and become accustomed to not having a true display it’s very easy to use. Great for my master bedroom to provide sound reinforcement and music for getting dressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up; great sound, low price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought it without hearing it (the audio version of “sight unseen”) and it was easy to set up and provides spectacular sound. Particularly handy is the Bluetooth connection with the included subwoofer; fewer wires and you can put the SW anywhere. Also, very simple to connect with my phone (again, Bluetooth) for streaming music. Our tv viewing room is pretty small so this unit may not be enough for a bigger space, but for us, it’s excellent. Highly recommend, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mainer

product_meta.title: Sony HT-S350 Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer: S350 2.1ch Sound Bar and Powerful Subwoofer - Home Theater Surround Sound Speaker System for TV - Bluetooth and HDMI Arc Compatible Bar
product_meta.description: Enjoy deeper, richer bass and immersive surround sound With this S350 2. 1Ch sound bar. A wireless subwoofer, 320W total output, and HDMI ARC one-cable connection make it perfect for the essential home theater. Simple to set-up and beautiful to look at, this sound bar brings S-Force Pro front Surround to your content for a cinematic audio experience. Refer user guide / user manual below for information.
feature_bullets: Ultimate Home Theater Upgrade: Sony 2.1 Channel Sound Bar System With Wireless Subwoofer for Optimized Audio
Audio Comes Alive:320W total power output brings content to life with incredible volume and clarity
Powerful Subwoofer: Large 6.30 Inches Speaker Unit and 6.16 Gallon Volume for a Deeper, Richer Bass Sound
S-Force Pro: Virtual Surround Sound Technology Emulates a Theater-Style Surround Sound Experience
7 Sound Modes: Choose from Auto Sound, Cinema, Music, Game, News, Sports, and Standard Audio Mode
Voice Enhancement: Isolates Voices and Amplifies Them over the Background Noise for Greater Clarity
Bluetooth Streaming: Stream Your Favorite Movies, Shows, and Music from Your Smartphone or Tablet
Wirelessly Connect: Connect via Bluetooth to Send Audio to the Slim Soundbar and Sub from Anywhere
One-Cable Connect: Send Audio and Control Information from the TV Using a Single Cable with HDMI Arc
In the Box: Soundbar, Subwoofer, Remote Control, Batteries, Optical Cable, Quick Setup Guide, Manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,131 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
